name: RHODE
description: RHODE is a luxury fashion and lifestyle brand known for its sophisticated and elegant designs.

name: RARE BEAUTY
description: RARE BEAUTY is a cosmetics brand founded by Selena Gomez, dedicated to promoting self-acceptance and mental health awareness through beauty.

name: AMUSE
description: AMUSE is a trendy and affordable beauty brand offering a wide range of makeup and skincare products.

name: ROUND LAB
description: ROUND LAB is a Korean skincare brand known for its innovative formulations and use of natural ingredients.

name: BOBBI BROWN
description: BOBBI BROWN is a renowned makeup artist and cosmetics brand, offering high-quality makeup and skincare products.

name: DR. JART+
description: DR. JART+ is a Korean skincare brand known for its dermatologist-tested products and innovative skincare technology.

name: HEIMISH
description: HEIMISH is a Korean beauty brand offering gentle and effective skincare solutions suitable for all skin types.

name: DR. CEURACLE
description: DR. CEURACLE is a dermatologist-developed skincare brand, specializing in products that target specific skin concerns.

name: KYLIE SKIN
description: KYLIE SKIN is a skincare brand founded by Kylie Jenner, offering a range of skincare essentials designed to achieve healthy and glowing skin.

name: ΚΙΚΟ MILANO
description: ΚΙΚΟ MILANO is an Italian cosmetics brand known for its high-quality and affordable makeup products, inspired by Milan's vibrant beauty scene.

name: LA ROCHE-POSAY
description: LA ROCHE-POSAY is a French skincare brand recommended by dermatologists worldwide, offering a range of gentle and effective skincare solutions.

name: HUXLEY
description: HUXLEY is a Korean skincare brand inspired by the minimalist beauty of the Sahara desert, offering luxurious and hydrating skincare products.
